jobs.title: Associate Technical Artist

sectionAccomplishments: Collaborated with a team of eleven people, six of those developers
Worked in an Agile setting with two week sprints and multiple user stores per sprint
Created acceptance tests, time estimates, and subtasks for each user story
Performed code reviews to ensure code quality was maintained
Transformed prototype pages into fully-fledged components by connecting AngularJS controllers to the backend via RESTful APIs
Transformed the frontend using FontAwesome Icons, Glyphicons, and Twitter Bootstrap
Used JAXB Objects to communicate between other subcomponents via an ActiveMQ queue
Developed a RESTful backend to service the HMI using Spring MVC and Java 8
Expanded upon existing Hibernate JPA Mappings for a PostGreSQL database
Ensured that the database migration was as painless as possible by using Flyaway
Enabled users to specify the recipient and format of products by implementing API endpoints in Java using Spring IO
Prevented software regression through the use of automated unit and integration tests written with JUnit and Mockito
